column2: The angel Gabriel has given me a great vision! I now see the true ways!
The last Prophet of God in the Islam Faith
My faith, the faith of Islam is gaining many followers. I should speak to the ruler of this land so that I may find a home for my people.
The Prophet of Islam would speak to you, seeking to find a land for his "Muslims". You could grant him a plot of land to live in, try to arrest the heretic or even convert to his faith!
Grant him a plot of land
Arrest the fool! I will have none of this.
Muslims from all across Arabia are coming under our banner, praise god!
We have forged an empire of Islam! It was a hard battle and many were lost. Many new Muslim converts from our new rich lands have joined our cause to replenish the ranks! Praise god!
The issue of inheritance is becoming a larger issue then we expected. While most of the realm seems to agree with our decision there are a a few of us that believe otherwise.
